fluidlogged.config.general.enable_fluid_: Enables or disables fluid permeability that allows fluids to pass through blocks.
Enables non-waterloggable blocks to become fluidloggable and also prevents blocks from breaking when exposed to flowing fluids.
fluidlogged.config.fluid_permeable_block: The list of blocks that allow fluids to pass through them unless a side is solid.
Note: The block must be fluidloggable in order to work.
fluidlogged.config.shape_independent_flu: The list of blocks that allow fluids to pass through them no matter the shape of the block.
Note: The block must be fluidloggable in order to work.
fluidlogged.config.blacklist.desc: Toggles whether the block list should be treated as a blacklist.
argument.fluid.property.duplicate: Property '%s' can only be set once for fluid %s
argument.fluid.property.invalid: Fluid %s does not accept '%s' for %s property
argument.fluid.property.novalue: Expected value for property '%s' on fluid %s
argument.fluid.property.unclosed: Expected closing ] for fluid state properties
